direct_link.description: Direct link to the user's profile or account

email.description: Email address associated with the user

available.description: Flag indicating if the user is currently available

availability_status.description: The current availability status of the user (e.g., 'Available', 'Away', 'Offline')

created_at.description: The timestamp when the user account was created

time_zone.description: Time zone setting for the user

language.description: Preferred language of the user for communication

wrap_up_time.description: Amount of time the user needs to wrap up a call before being available for another
